work.name: ScooterLab Funded by the National Science Foundation
work.summary: Focused on Ramp API development, managing and optimizing back-end processes.
highlights: Handled data management and collection for back-end systems.
Improved system reliability through data resampling and processing.
Worked on concurrent embedded programming and deployment.

work.name: Flywheel Energy
work.summary: Developed back-end services for energy management systems.
highlights: Specialized in Ionic, Angular, and TypeScript.
Optimized existing apps and handled Full-stack development.
Used Azure Management Console for automation.

projects.name: Diet Companion
projects.summary: An AI-driven diet tracking web app built using Ionic/Angular.
highlights: Defined database models using ODM and ORM libraries like Sequelize and Mongoose.
Used Ionic/Angular for front-end development and built internal APIs.

projects.name: Sequelize Model Generator
projects.summary: A Python program that generates Sequelize Models in TypeScript.
highlights: Generates Sequelize models with snake_case field names.
Handles foreign key relations and includes a revert option.

projects.name: Saint Dracul Arena
projects.summary: A Doom-like video game built using Unity 3D.
highlights: Built game back-end processes using C#.
Used Unity3D engine and Blender for game development.

volunteer.summary: Organizing and running a workshop introducing Linux for daily use.
